metadata.title: Amine Sghir - Full Stack Developer & Data Engineer
metadata.description: Portfolio of Amine Sghir, Full Stack Developer & Data Engineer with 8+ years of experience in Data, AI, LLM, Python and Cloud.

hero.title: Full Stack Developer & Data Engineer
hero.tagline: I design and develop innovative data and web solutions, from cloud pipelines to SaaS applications and generative AI.

title.line2: one line of code at a time

description.p1: Full Stack Developer & Data Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I combine technical expertise and entrepreneurial vision to create innovative solutions.
description.p2: Reliable, innovative and passionate, I bring rigor, creativity and versatility to tackle the most ambitious challenges. I founded 3 SaaS products and helped numerous companies in their digital transformation.

data.title: Data Engineering
data.description: Design of robust data pipelines on AWS and Azure. Experience with Kafka, Spark, and real-time processing.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: Modern web applications with Next.js, Django and FastAPI. Focus on performance and user experience.

saas.title: SaaS Entrepreneurship
saas.description: 3 SaaS products successfully launched: Take My Keys, Locary and Judia. From idea to product, through growth.

skills.subtitle: A versatile tech stack, from data engineering to full-stack development, including generative AI.

experience.subtitle: 8+ years of experience in data, development and digital transformation consulting.

sodexo.title: Tech Lead & AI Engineer
sodexo.description: Design and development of an internal LLM-based application for automated data extraction from supplier PDFs (spec sheets). Product and supplier attribute extraction, product/article database maintenance, and automatic classification. Use cases: supplier changes, dietary compliance verification (halal, organic, allergens).

engie_gems.title: Senior Data Engineer
engie_gems.description: Design of cloud data pipelines (Azure, AWS) with CI/CD. Development of Python libraries. Time series management tool for analysts and traders.

klaimy.title: Senior Software Engineer
klaimy.description: From-scratch development of client application and API. React/Next.js frontend, Django backend. Queue system for AI processing.

openclassrooms.title: Mentor / Evaluator
openclassrooms.description: Mentoring students on Python Developer and Data Analyst tracks. Evaluation of deliverables and validation of defenses.

visian.title: Manager → Senior Consultant
visian.description: 5+ years of digital transformation consulting. Evolution from Data Consultant to Manager with team and strategic project management.

credit_agricole.title: Senior Data Engineer
credit_agricole.description: Data pipelines on Dataiku and Python. Code structuring and implementation of development best practices.

engie_mastermind.title: Tech Lead / Data Engineer
engie_mastermind.description: ETL architecture on AWS (S3, Glue, Lambda) and C3.ai. Linky/Gazpar data for energy consumption monitoring. Splunk/Grafana monitoring.

projects.subtitle: Products I designed and developed as founder or technical co-founder.

takemykeys.title: Take My Keys
takemykeys.description: Concierge and rental management platform. Listing publication, guest welcome, reservation management and rent collection.

locary.title: Locary
locary.description: Real estate rental management SaaS with automation and AI. Bank synchronization, receipt generation, automatic reminders.

judia.title: Judia
judia.description: Intelligent AI email assistant. Automatic organization, spam/fraud detection, response writing assistance. 100% free.

contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how I can help you make it happen.

openTo.title: Open To
openTo.freelance: Freelance Data Engineering & Full Stack missions
